About Me

BIO

I was born on 18th December 1999 in a small town in Githunguri, Kiambu. After 3 years of school we moved to Zimmerman, Nairobi.....Currently I'm in university.My interests are simple, to be master in web development in the next few years while also pursuing my ultimate goal which is to be an AI(Artificial Intelligence) specialist.
